title: Coding Standards are Part of Continuous Improvement
content: Coding standards extend to something beyond just code formatters. Coding Standards give team members the same understanding of what's expected of them.  Developers spend less time trying to understand code when it's style and operating model look similar across modules and applications. Stan

title: स्वचालन फ्रेमवर्क की मुख्य विशेषताएं
content: In the modern software industry, Automation is becoming a must-have feature for the testing teams to quickly test and certify builds and find the bugs.
